text: Cers may refer to: * Ceramide synthase (CerS), an enzyme of the endoplasmic reticulum that catalyzes the synthesis of ceramide * Cers, Hérault, France * Cers (wind), very strong wind in the bas-Languedoc region of France * Cers Cup, a roller hockey competition organized by the Comitée Européen de Rink- Hockey * CERS, a research centre at the Hanken school of economics and business administration, Finland
title: Cers
